name: tenoxui-docs
description: TenoxUI documentation for docs repository of tenoxui website.

scripts.update-readme: git add README.md && git commit -m 'docs: Update README.md'
scripts.commit-lang-en: git add id/ && git commit -m 'docs(en): Update documentation for en language'
scripts.commit-lang-id: git add id/ && git commit -m 'docs(id): Update documentation for id language'

author: nousantx
